LanguageData.Apparel_DOOMPraetorSuit.label: Praetor suit
LanguageData.Apparel_DOOMPraetorSuit.description: D22 Model, gives the user superhuman abilities. Excellent for travelling to Hell and back or surviving years of irrelevance with mods.
LanguageData.Apparel_DOOMPraetorHelm.label: Praetor helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_DOOMPraetorHelm.description: Part of the Praetor Suit, includes advanced HUD systems that assist the user with combat and also protects the head from energy attacks.
LanguageData.Apparel_DOOMGuyHelm.label: Security helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_DOOMGuyHelm.description: Classic UAC security helmet given to UAC Marines. Good for avoiding getting your head ripped and torn.
